name: Collctiv
description: Collctiv is the group payments revolution. For busy social people who don't want the hassle of collecting money for a group trip, event or activity. And for the companies that need to handle group purchases and bookings in a seamless and simple way.
one_liner: Collctiv is the group payments revolution. For busy social people who don't want the hassle of collecting money for a group trip, event or activity. And for the companies that need to handle group purchases and bookings in a seamless and simple way.
